title: OptiSwap Pro
text: A suite of HOGE-first DeFi protocols for community-building fun and learning.

title: HOGE SMP Minecraft Server
text: A virtual brand activating Minecraft Survivor server. A web2 to web3 brand activator providing a path to market for the legacy industries of today. A play, experience, socialize, and enjoy ecosystem with game mechanics to cater to the legacy Minecraft gaming audiences. HOGE is focused on bridging the gap between legacy gaming and blockchain based gaming to usher in the evolved AAA gaming experience. Built on top of open-sourced Minecraft Home to 90m+ active players a month. A forever digital home for our deployed IP and community to integrate with.
